Pre-Game Insights: Bolivia made the perfect start at their new home venue, Estadio Municipal El Alto, with a 4-0 win over Venezuela last month.
Colombia recorded a famous win over Argentina in Barranquilla in their last outing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bolivia's victory away in Chile was their first on the road in qualifying in 67 matches, since a 7-1 win against Venezuela in 1993.
Colombia are unbeaten in their last 13 meetings with Bolivia, winning 10 of those.
